author: vmassol
msg: Added news about upcoming development build release

author: vmassol
msg: - created new cactus.src.ejb property that points to where the ejb to test is located
- fixed ejb sample (ejb-jar.xml was in the wrong location)

author: vmassol
msg: - Fixed bugs that were introduced during tha addition of the cactus.build.goal.war and cactus.build.goal.ejb properties
- Added new cactus.src.war property to specify where the original non-cactified war is generated by ${cactus.build.goal.war} goal.

- Remove version property as anyway Maven plugins need fixed versions. It may have worked but it doesn't yield the benefit I initially thought, i.e. the ability to override the version in a build.properties file (this doesn't work)
